A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Legendary Luke Skywalker - Humanized. A man so powerful with the force\, now with flaws & mistakes -- The film has split its \"fan-base\" due to this. For me\, TLJ is one of the best Star Wars film to date -- there are its flaws & unanswered questions from the previous film; but the overall plot completely spat on my expectations\, in a good way.
